div.p: Venerable, well-learned sir, I offer you my willing service at all times. Therefore, my wife and I send you a little fasting food as a friendly greeting. We wish to make up for the little and always remain entrusted to you. With that, we commend ourselves to God.

Given on the 23rd day of May in Neunforn 1564. Your always willing Benedikt... To the venerable and well-learned sir Heinrich Bullinger, the church leader in Zurich, my kind lord and good friend, to hand. Zurich.
